marno.client

Class ClientGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • marno.client.ClientGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ClientGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Main Graphical User Interface window for the chat client.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addChatText

        public void addChatText(java.lang.String text)
        Appends text to the chat area.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be added

      • addChatText

        public void addChatText(java.lang.String text,
                        boolean append)
        Adds text to the chat area (either before or after the current content).
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be added
        append - appends the text if true, prepends it otherwise

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage()
        Sends what is currently stored in the input field as a public message. The input field is reset once the message has been sent.

      • updateUsername

        private void updateUsername()
        Change the username of the user at top of user list and update the window title.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        If the client is connected, try to disconnect it from the server, then update the window. Otherwise, establish a new connection, then update the window.
